helpUsage: Sets if announcements are sent with embeds or without.```/embed toggle <disable/enable> [level]```
Enable/disable pings for announcement messages.```/embed ping disable/enable> [level]```

Customise the embed different sections of embeds.```/embed customise title <input> [level]
/embed customise description <input> [level]
/embed customise image <input> [level]
/embed customise color <input> [level]```
Add an embed for a specific level.```/embed add <level>```
Remove an embed for a specific level.```/embed remove <level>```
Test the current announcement message.```/embed test [level]```
Get a list of all the variables available for KyuBot.```/embed variables```
titleTooLong: Max character count is 100 for title, you are over the count by **%s**.
titleUpdated: Announcement title has been updated to:```%s```
descriptionTooLong: Max character count is 1250, you are over the count by **%s**.
descriptionUpdated: Announcement message has been updated to:```%s```
imageInvalid: Given link is not an image, please provide a valid image link. Image types currently supported: jpg | jpeg | png | gif.
imageUpdated:
Announcement embed image has been updated to %s

By continuing you understand the image you are uploading follows the **[Discord's Terms of Service](https://discord.com/terms)**. Anything that is uploaded is your responsibility and you will be held accountable for it.
colorInvalid:
Color %s is not a valid color. Please select a color from one of the following colors:```default
blue
gray
green
orange
pink
purple
red
teal
yellow```
colorUpdated: Embed color for annnouncement has been updated to **%s**.
customiseInvalidSection: Unable to edit %s, current sections that can be edited are: `title, description, image, color`.
customiseAddInvalidLevel: Unable to set announcement for level %s. Please make sure the level is an integer.
customiseAddAlreadyExists: Announcement already exists for level %s. Please remove/edit the current embed.
customiseAddMaxReached: You have reached the maximum amount of 10 custom embeds. Please delete an embed, before adding a new embed for level %s
customiseAddSuccess: Custom embed has been added for level %s.
customiseRemoveInvalidLevel: Custom embed does not exist for level %s.
customiseRemoveNotExists: Custom embed does not exist for level %s.
customiseRemoveSuccess: Custom embed has been removed for level %s.
notFound: Unable to find embed for level %s.
